title: Business center, Conference room, Custom cabinetry, Key fob entry
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 687 Sq.', 'Ft.', "Find the perfect blend of beauty and balance, form and function, work and play at the Cielo, DTC's newest urban apartments in the heart of southeast Denver.", 'With our central location, you are just minutes from fine dining, shopping, recreation, and within walking distance to the Belleview light rail station.', 'This luxurious community features a high-tech fitness center with TVs, clubroom with kitchen, Wi-fi cafe with java bar, plasma TV and DVD player.', 'An opulent swimming pool with spa with Wi-fi service and an outdoor fireplace lounge with BBQ grills for your leisure.', 'Interior finishes include exotic granite countertops, full size washers and dryers with electric fireplaces in select floor plans.', 'Each home includes a natural, light maple hard-wood style flooring in kitchens and entries, with custom-designed espresso finish cabinetry, clean and black steel energy efficient appliances, electric ranges, built-in microwaves and dishwashers, nine foot ceilings with crown molding and modern track lighting, earth- toned accent walls and oversized walk-in closets.', 'Center yourself at Cielo.', 'Features:', 'Microwave, Central air conditioning, Walk in closets, Pantry, Large closets, Ceiling fans, Central heat, Custom cabinetry, Garbage disposal, Open layout, Energy Star appliances, Granite countertops, Breakfast bar, Stainless appliances, Linen closets, Private patio, In-unit washer and dryer, 9 ft ceilings, Separate dining area, Electric fireplace, City and mountain/greenspace views, Key fob entry, Dishwasher, Vinyl plank flooring, Ice maker, Private balcony, Soaking tub', 'Community Amenities:', 'Close to I-25, Bellview and I-225, Clubhouse, Reserved Parking, Conference room, Outdoor Pool, 24 hour fitness center, Business center, Cyber Café, Cardio Equipment, Complimentary Wi-Fi, Accepts dogs, Hot Tub, Towel service, Garage parking, BBQ area, Near public transportation, shopping and entertainment, Accepts cats', 'Pet Policy', 'Cielo welcomes your pet!', 'We are a pet friendly community offering plenty of space for your pet to run and play.', 'Our apartments accommodate up to two pets per home.', 'Additional deposits and breed restrictions apply.', 'Your pets will love it here!', 'Interested in more
